text: Cystitis vs. pyelonephritis: manifestation Cystitis: localized Pyelonephritis: generalized * Bladder irritation/ * Fever, chills, nausea lower urinary tract and vomiting symptoms (LUTS) + Myalgia and malaise * Dysuria * Risk of urosepsis * Frequency, urgency * Local: flank pain, CVA tenderness, dysuria and frequency
